titles.title: Agility in Manufacturing Preparedness Act of 2025
Agility in Manufacturing Preparedness Act of 2025
A bill to allow for greater collaboration between the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority and the network of Manufacturing USA institutes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
